oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Egg Production and Packaging Control of Quality and Safety in Organic Production Chains
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ogden, Iain
L端ck, Lorna
Wyss, Gabriela
Brandt, Kirsten
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This leaflet provides a practical overview for producers and others involved in egg production and packaging, of what can be done at these steps to improve quality and safety of organically produced eggs, in addition to certification and general food safety require-ments. Other leaflets cover production of other commodities and separate leaflets aim at consumers and retailers.
